Technique: BURNED, OXIDIZED; ENGOBE; FORMED ON THE POTTER'S WHEEL; BURNED, OXIDIZED; PAINTED
Name: Bowl
Description: Semispherical bowl with inward turning rim and stable base. The upper third of the body bears a painted decoration consisting of two stripes in wine-red and orangey colours, as well as an incised line which encircles the piece. Reddish paste and creme-coloured coating on the surface.
